short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly open various types of Google Docs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Developers who work with Google App Script often have to use document ID's.

Opening those specific documents from the ID, without the complete URL, is annoying.

This extension allows you to select the file type, input the document ID, and it'll take you straight to the document in Google Docs.
